metrics.description: (near) realtime information about the availability per (free-floating area, station). Needs aggregation.
(near) realtime information about the availability per (free-floating area, station), derived from statusses of assets. Needs aggregation to remove all personal movements.

standards.name: MDS-provider-vehicles
standards.description:
The /vehicles is a near-realtime endpoint and returns the current status of vehicles in an agency's Jurisdiction and/or area of agency responsibility.
The Mobility Data Specification (MDS), a project of the Open Mobility Foundation (OMF), is a set of Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) focused on shared mobility services such as dockless scooters, bicycles, mopeds, and carshare, and inspired by projects like GTFS and GBFS.

standards.name: MDS-provider-stops
standards.description:
Stop information should be updated on a near-realtime basis by providers who operate docked mobility devices in a given municipality.
The Mobility Data Specification (MDS), a project of the Open Mobility Foundation (OMF), is a set of Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) focused on shared mobility services such as dockless scooters, bicycles, mopeds, and carshare, and inspired by projects like GTFS and GBFS.
